Ori: Talking to people every day will increase your friendship with them.
Loc: 每天與人交談會增進你與他們的友誼。

Ori: Promising to complete a task and not delivering isn』t a good idea.
Loc: 承諾完成的事情做不到不是一件好事。

Ori: The better you are at a skill, the less stamina you』ll use doing it.
Loc: 你的技能等級越高，你做這件事消耗的體力就越小。

Ori: Swimming for too long can be hazardous to your health.
Loc: 游泳太長時間會對你的健康有害。

Ori: If it』s shiny, it』s probably worth something.
Loc: 如果有東西閃閃發光，它可能很值錢。

Ori: Almost anything can be sold, but not everything can be bought.
Loc: 幾乎任何東西都可以賣，但不是所有東西都可以買到。

Ori: Tools will break if you use them too much.
Loc: 工具用久了之後就會損壞。

Ori: Crafted items tend to be more valuable than their ingredients.
Loc: 手工製作的物品往往比其原料更有價值。

Ori: Passing out will do damage to your tools.
Loc: 昏倒會損壞你的工具耐久度。

Ori: If you need a bed, Fletch keeps sleeping bags in the Base Tent.
Loc: 如果你需要一張床，Fletch會把一些睡袋放在帳篷里。

Ori: Digging is real fun. Digging is real fun. Digging is real fun.
Loc: 挖掘真的很有趣。挖掘真的很有趣。挖掘真的很有趣。

Ori: Sharks are only tough when they are in the water.
Loc: 鯊魚只有在水裡才兇殘。

Ori: Sometimes trees can drop other items.
Loc: 有時樹木會掉落其他物品。

Ori: Wild animals can be kept in a pen if you fence them off.
Loc: 如果你把野生動物圍起來，就可以把它們關在圍欄里。

Ori: You can bury items by dropping them on the ground and covering them with dirt.
Loc: 你可以把物品扔在地上，然後用泥土掩埋起來。

Ori: Food made at a cooking table will recover more health and stamina.
Loc: 在烹飪桌上做的食物會恢復更多的健康和體力。

Ori: You can place carryable items on most vehicles.
Loc: 您可以在大多數載具上放置可攜帶的物品。

Ori: Different fish can be found depending on the  season, biome and time of day.
Loc: 根據季節、地形和時間，可以釣到不同的魚。

Ori: Staying out late will tire you out.
Loc: 在外面呆到很晚會使你筋疲力盡。

Ori: Spring is egg season.
Loc: 春天是產蛋的季節。

Ori: A shady visitor might appear on rainy days.
Loc: 可疑的訪客可能會在雨天出現。

Ori: Fletch might be able to help you upgrade your home.
Loc: Fletch也許能幫你升級你的房子。

Ori: Animals can be caught in traps easier if they have low health.
Loc: 如果動物的健康狀況較差，它們會更容易陷入陷阱。

Ori: Wild Animals will eat your crops if they aren』t fenced off.
Loc: 如果沒有圍欄，野生動物會吃掉你的農作物。

Ori: Keep your farm animals safe by fencing them off from predators.
Loc: 保護你的農場動物免受捕食者的攻擊。

Ori: Try cooking all sorts of food.
Loc: 嘗試烹飪各種食物。

Ori: Wheelbarrows can carry other items besides dirt.
Loc: 獨輪車可以攜帶除泥土外的其他物品。

Ori: Use the whistle emote to call farm animals to you.
Loc: 用口哨表情召喚農場動物。

Ori: Certain flowers can be placed in a keg.
Loc: 某些花可以種植在木桶裡。

Ori: The mines layout shifts and changes every day.
Loc: 地下礦洞的佈局每天都在變化。

Ori: Fletch can help you move buildings if you need to.
Loc: 如果需要，Fletch可以幫助你搬遷建築。

Ori: Be wary of the Wary Mu.
Loc: 要警惕鶴鴕。

Ori: Crops that grow all year are worth less than seasonal crops.
Loc: 全年生長的作物價值低於季節性作物。

Ori: You can pick up vehicles by damaging them.
Loc: 你可以通過攻擊載具來撿起載具。

Ori: Bats are annoying.
Loc: 蝙蝠很討厭。

Ori: Don't leave stuff in the mines if you want to keep it.
Loc: 如果你想保留東西，就不要把東西留在礦井裡。

Ori: The travel bag in the Base Tent can be accessed from any island.
Loc: 基地帳篷中的旅行包里的物品可以從任何島嶼上取用。

Ori: You will recover stamina slowly if you are full.
Loc: 如果你吃飽了，你會慢慢恢復體力。
